channel.title: vTPM on Kip Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in vTPM on Kip Jiang

item.title: Virtual Machine with vTPM in Ubuntu
item.description: Preparation Reference Paper Berger, S., Goldman, K., Pendarakis, D., Safford, D., Valdez, E. and Zohar, M., 2015, March. Scalable attestation: A step toward secure and trusted clouds. In 2015 IEEE International Conference on Cloud Engineering (pp. 185-194). IEEE. Environment Host: Ubuntu 18.04 Guest: Ubuntu 14.04 Source Code seabios-tpm 2. libtpms 3. swtpm 4. qemu-tpm Tree of Path kip └── workspace ├── libtpms ├── qemu-tpm ├── seabios ├── swtpm └── test SeaBIOS SeaBIOS 包含 vTPM 支持的分支 seabios-tpm 最开始由 Stefan 维护，现在已经成功将其合并到主分支 SeaBIOS。因此，下面的实验中我们使用其主分支。
